text: Mata Amrithanandamayi Devi will visit the city on February 16. Elaborate arrangements for accommodating a large number of devotees at the National College – the venue of the camp, according to Ramakrishnanandapuri, secretary of the Mata Amrithanandamayi Devi Trust. Special bhajans and yoga will be performed from 6 p.m. at the end of which the gathering will be blessed individually, he added.
title: ‘Amma’ to be in Tiruchi on Feb. 16
